meanings.definition: A salt or ester of malic acid.
meanings.sent1: I added a sprinkle of malate to the solution.
meanings.sent2: The malate in the fruit gives it a tangy flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous chef accidentally spilled malate all over the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of malate, spreading joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the malate made it stand out among the other compounds.

meanings.definition: A compound that is an intermediate in the citric acid cycle.
meanings.sent1: The body uses malate to produce energy during the citric acid cycle.
meanings.sent2: Malate plays a crucial role in the metabolic process of the citric acid cycle.
meanings.sent3: The citric acid cycle was like a busy highway with malate as the traffic conductor.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed smoothly, like malate moving through the citric acid cycle.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of the citric acid cycle depends on the presence of malate.
